archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0940
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Product owner, I want complex customers to have the following methods for invoice 'delivery' '- an email with .pdf invoice attached (required where businesses have automated scanners on incoming mail containing .pdfs) '- receive an email with a link to self service (i.e. Mobile App, the 'simple' web portal, or Complex customer portal where they can view/download the invoice (and export as per above)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
